channel.title: Java on WinterCat's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Java on WinterCat's blog

item.title: About SpringDataJPA
item.description:
About SpringDataJPA

Spring Data JPA, part of the larger Spring Data family, makes it easy to easily implement JPA based repositories. This module deals with enhanced support for JPA based data access layers. It makes it easier to build Spring-powered applications that use data access technologies.

item.title: About Spring Boot
item.description:
Spring Boot

Spring Boot makes it easy to create stand-alone, production-grade Spring based Applications that you can “just run”.

item.title: About Maven
item.description:
About Maven

Apache Maven is a software project management and comprehension tool. Based on the concept of a project object model (POM), Maven can manage a project’s build, reporting and documentation from a central piece of information.

item.title: About Java
item.description:
About Java

Javaに関する知識を再整理 (中国語カバー)

Used by over 10 million developers and running on 56 billion devices globally, the Java Platform truly moves the world forward, and now even faster with Java 17. Download or try out Java here!
